The Best Healthcare for your Team To work Effectively

Making Healthcare Easier For SME's And Corporations.

At Doctoora, We Provide a More Direct Healthcare Services.


Convenience

No stress or queues. Find the best service via our platform. Interact with preferred service providers via telemedicine, in clinic or at your home.

Efficiency

Our services stand out because we focus on efficiency. Coupled with a passionate quality assurance team that work on steroids! Quality is guaranteed.

Intergration

We have integrated over 6000 healthcare service access points in Nigeria. Top doctors, clinics, hospitals, labs, gyms & pharmacies into one platform, for you.

Digital

No more paper based contracts, care requests, letters of approval and other needless hassles. Go to the dashboard to access all you need, anytime, anywhere.

Double your Impact

Improve Employee Health

Increase your employees' morale by giving them access to our wide range of patient-centric services, which can be assessed at their leisure, anywhere in the country.

Support Community Development

Our commitment to investing in physical infrastructure for healthcare services means your payments will do more for the communities your employees reside in through Doctoora.

Our Corporate Membership Services

Admin Portal Built For Savvy HR Teams

  • Add up to 10,000 employees with our bulk upload feature.
  • Assign resources to Staff in a flexible way, choose who gets what.
  • Keep track of purchased resources.
  • Create and define your own bouquets and select the mix of services to offer your people.
  • Purchase new health credits and roll over unassigned credits.
  • Order preemployment medicals, recreational drug tests, covid tests and more with ease.

A Personal Health Portal For Your Staff

  • In-built personal healthcare records
  • Specialist search & appointment booking service
  • Ask a Doctor (chat), book medical tests, online pharmacy
  • Request medical reports with ease
  • Compare rates, ratings & reviews

Flexible and Affordable Pricing

Choose your preferred pricing from postpaid, monthly/annual payment or pay-as-you-go options. Prepaid pay-as-you-go credits have an extended validity period of 18months and unused credits can be rolled over.

Dedicated Admin Portal

Manage all your staff health needs in one place. You add /remove employees and assign spending limits/ health resources with ease.

Easy Staff Health Management

Order pre-employment medicals, drug testing and request employee health reports with our easy to use platform.

Our Pricing Options


Post-Paid

Sign a corporate retainer-ship for a selection of services and pay at pre-agreed intervals based on staff consumption. Our service agreement will detail our tariffs for services nationwide.

Pay-As-You-Go

Save money on healthcare when you purchase Doctoora credits. Credits can be spent on any of healthcare service on our platform and at our physical locations. Credits have 18 month validity period and you can roll-over any used credits. Buy in credits bulk and allocate to staff at will.

Monthly/Yearly

Our limited packages offer you the option of selecting from our predesigned bouquets. So whether you want to offer your staff only telemedicine or you want the full range of services, the choice is entirely up to your HR team. Enjoy unbeatable pricing with pay monthly or yearly plans. Get high quality service for your people, every time.
